section.section: In addition to the limitations in subsection (a) of this section, a State facility may not admit an individual who is 65 years old or older unless a geriatric evaluation team determines that there is no available, less restrictive form of care or treatment that is adequate for the needs of the individual.

If admission is denied because of the determination of the geriatric evaluation team, the team shall:
Inform the applicant; and
Help the applicant obtain the less restrictive form of care or treatment that the team finds would be adequate for the needs of the individual.
